id.description: unique ID for this payment attempt

payment_hash.description: the hash of the *payment_preimage* which will prove payment

amount_sent_msat.description: the amount we actually sent, including fees

destination.description: the final destination of the payment if known

amount_msat.description: the amount the destination received, if known

created_at.description: the UNIX timestamp showing when this payment was initiated

label.description: the label, if given to sendpay

bolt11.description: the bolt11 string (if pay supplied one)

bolt12.description: the bolt12 string (if supplied for pay: **experimental-offers** only).

erroronion.description: the error onion returned on failure, if any.
